cause.description:
With our temperature rising, abnormal weather phenomena becoming more extreme, and our country somehow still unable to do anything politically, socially, or legally, we need to stand together to bring about change. Small things like replacing all the lighbulbs in your house with energy efficient CFL bulbs (which saves you money,) switching to paperless statements for your banking and credit cards, recycling whenever possible or even just telling a friend to do any of these things can really help turn around the upcoming problem. The International Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) set up by the UN, has strongly urged all countries to start working towards a global solution, with all of its the highly regarded international scientists backing that measure, which we desperately need.
1. Strengthen CAFE standards
2. Make every home energy friendly
3. Support alternative energy
cause.mission: Stop the spread and intensification of Global Warming & Climate change
cause.name: Help Prevent Global Warming
